jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (Junior/Mid-level) - Automotive
jobs_results.description:
Position

iOS Developer (Junior/Mid-level) – Automotive

Munich; Ingolstadt; Porto
Professional

We are looking for experienced and highly ambitious software developers who are motivated to develop high-end mobile applications in the field of automotive industry. Together with our customers it is our goal to shape and offer the best possible user experience for upcoming customer applications. Join our journey and become a part of our team!

RESPONSIBILITIES

You will
> enjoy writing high-performing and easy to maintain code in Swift
> develop new iOS applications using cutting-edge technology (MVVM)
> understand how important code testing is
> like to work in an interdisciplinary team in an agile environment delivering solutions to leading car manufacturers

REQUIREMENTS

> University degree in Computer Science or in one comparable study or professional experience
> 1+ years of professional experience with iOS (Swift/SwiftUI/Objective-C) using MVVM
> Experience with GIT, Automated Testing and Fastlane
> Like to work in a dynamic and multicultural team
> Proficient in English, spoken and written
Nice to have:
> German language skills
> Knowledge of C++ or any other computer language
> Experience with Reactive Extensions, AWS services and Bluetooth

BENEFITS

> A highly innovative, agile and unique team with a great working culture and an employer that appreciates news initiatives and ideas
> kununu.de can give you an impression of our working culture! (

Pixida is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer! We are committed to a work environment that supports, inspires and respects all individuals and in which all aspects of employment are applied without discrimination. Therefore we encourage all individuals to apply!

In order to be able to get a comprehensive overview of your application, we ask you to make sure to include certificates, employer's references, etc. with your resume. In addition, we ask you to provide information about your possible start date, salary expectations and language skills.

Ready to take your career
to the next level?

Tiago Faro
E-Mail auf connecticum.de ansehen

jobs_results.title: TruckScout24 (Essen): IOS App Developer (m/w/d)
jobs_results.description:
IT

Du begeisterst Dich für App-Entwicklung und hast Lust, eine komplette Branche bei der Digitalisierung zu begleiten? Dann suchen wir genau Dich!

Die Machineseeker Group betreibt mit den Online-Marktplätzen Maschinensucher, Machineseeker, TruckScout24, Gebrauchtmaschinen sowie Werktuigen das führende Netzwerk für gebrauchte Maschinen und Nutzfahrzeuge in Europa. Mehr als 12.000 Anbieter inserieren derzeit über 300.000 Maschinen auf den Plattformen. Über 15 Millionen monatliche Besucher erzeugen dabei ein jährlich vermitteltes Anfragevolumen von mehr als 120 Milliarden Euro. Seit 1999 wächst die Firma jedes Jahr profitabel, sodass wir unser Team in Essen fortlaufend verstärken.

Für unser Team am Standort Essen suchen wir ab sofort einen iOS App Developer (m/w/d) in Voll- oder Teilzeit.

Wir setzen konsequent auf Working from Office. Mehr Innovationen („Gespräche an der Kaffeemaschine“), bessere Arbeitsbedingungen (Breitband, Klimaanlage, 3 Bildschirme, große Schreibtische etc.), optimale Einarbeitung, höhere Bindung, Schaffung Firmenkultur (inkl. Koch, Fitnessraum und -coach) sowie saubere Trennung Office/Wohnung.

TruckScout24 ist Europas größte Plattform für Nutz- und Freizeitfahrzeuge. Über 4.000 Kunden inserieren aktuell über 120.000 Fahrzeuge und Maschinen. Besonderer Fokus liegt auf de…

Aufgaben
• Du bist Teil unseres Entwicklungsteams und konzeptionierst und entwickelst neue Features in UIKit, SwiftUI, Combine und Realm for Swift
• Du bist mitverantwortlich für die Erstellung und die Umsetzung des Anwendungs-Designs unserer nativen iOS-App
• Du evaluierst aktuelle Trends in der iOS-Entwicklung und hältst die App auf dem aktuellen Stand (Continuous Refactoring, insbesondere das Refactoring von MVC zu MVVM)
• Du begleitest den Freigabeprozess der App bis zur Veröffentlichung & betreust die iOS-App auch produktiv

Qualifikation
• Du hast ein Studium der Informatik, Wirtschaftsinformatik, Mathematik, Physik oder Ähnliches oder eine entsprechende Ausbildung abgeschlossen
• Du hast mindestens ein Jahr Erfahrung als Swift-Entwickler & hast idealerweise bereits selbst eine App entwickelt
• Du hast gute Deutsch- & Englischkenntnisse
• Du arbeitest selbstständig, strukturiert & sorgfältig

Benefits
• Überdurchschnittliches Startgehalt
• Möglichkeit beim stark wachsenden Marktführer mit dem besten Team viel zu lernen
• Viel Verantwortung & Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten in einer der erfolgreichsten Internetfirmen des Ruhrgebiets
• 38,5 Stundenwoche bei Vollzeit & 29 Urlaubstage
• Klimatisiertes, neues & großzügiges Büro (nur wenige Gehminuten vom Essener HBF!)
• Flexible Arbeitszeiten & flache Hierarchien
• Fitnessraum & Personal Trainer
• Kostenlose Getränke & Verpflegung, inklusive Koch
• Ergonomische Stühle & höhenverstellbare Schreibtische
• Individueller Englischunterricht bei Interesse
• Regelmäßige Teamevents sowie Sommer- und Weihnachtsfest

Aktualisiert: vor 2 StundenJob ID 1314515751-200 MitarbeitendeTechnologie, Information und Internet

Kontakt

INTERESSIERT?

Sende uns einfach Deinen Lebenslauf. Tipp: Schreib alle Abschlussnoten mit in den CV, um den Kennenlernprozess zu beschleunigen.

Deine persönliche Ansprechpartnerin:

Clara Jenkner

Machineseeker Group GmbH

Kronprinzenstr. 9

45128 Essen

Tel.: +49 (0) 201 857 86 125

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Düsseldorf)
jobs_results.description:
As we continue to grow, we are seeking for talented people to join our team.

Job description

Join our growing team where you will take ownership of your role and contribute actively with your ideas on new projects in a creative and stimulating working environment. You should be able to take responsibility and handle your tasks independently. Also, you will have a dedicated time to improve yourself, do research on favourite topics, and learn cutting-edge technologies.

Come and join us!

Responsibilities

Plan, develop, deploy, and maintain software solutions

Choose software technologies and architectures

Take leadership

Define tasks and give time estimates

Write clean, maintainable code and test it

Collaborate with clients: both technical and non-technical team members

Be able to present your solutions in front of clients and group of colleagues

Use agile methodologies in development, participate in code reviews, pair programming, and other knowledge sharing activities

Continually improve your skills and push others to go forward with their knowledge

Requirements

At least 4 years of experience working as an iOS Developer

Excellent computer science fundamentals, especially in OOP

Excellent knowledge of the Cocoa Touch framework, based on Swift or Objective-C

Excellent knowledge in reactive programming (RxSwift, ReactiveCocoa)

Experience with software architecture (MVVM, VIPER, MVC)

Ability to write clean and testable code as well as unit tests

Excellent debugging skills

Experience working in a team environment

Excellent English skills

Great salary and bonuses

Free books

Apply for this position

Send us an email with your CV or fill the form below and start your new challenge at troido.

jobs_results.title: Ios Developer
jobs_results.description:
Senior Mobile Engineer - iOS

📍 Location:
Berlin/Munich/Hamburg

💰 Salary:
Up to €100k and stock options

I am working with an exciting business that offers a premium transportation service that combines elegance and efficiency for travelers around the globe.

I am looking for a Senior Mobile Engineer to enhance the app experience. In this role, you will help shape the team's roadmap, review pull requests, and participate in pair programming.

YOUR ROLE:
• Lead the architectural design and development of the app, navigating complex features.
• Mentor colleagues and promote a culture of continuous learning.
• Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality.
• Use strong problem-solving skills to address technical challenges.
• Collaborate with product and design teams

YOUR SKILLS:
• 5+ years of iOS app development experience using Swift.
• Strong knowledge of iOS frameworks, design patterns, and best practices.
• Proficient in Xcode and related development tools.
• Familiarity with App Store releases, Fastlane, CocoaPods, and SPM.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
• Familiarity with automated testing (unit, functional, end-to-end).
• Experience mentoring junior engineers in both technical and soft skills.
• Proficient in GraphQL and/or REST and knowledgeable about the network stack.

ON OFFER:

Flexible working options, ESOPs, Regular team socials, personal development plan based on your career goals and lots more..

If you are interested please reach out to me to discuss the position today!

DE:
493031196755

UK:
442033076824

Email:
yashica.bharvirkar@trustinsoda.com

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Bonial.com, part of Axel Springer SE, is a leading drive to store marketing partner across Europe and South America. Bonial inspires millions of shoppers each month by connecting them with their favorite brands & retailers.

More than 1500 retailers & brands across all retail sectors rely on the tailor-made, data driven marketing solutions from Bonial.com to promote their offers & reach measurable business results with maximized return on investment.

Job Description

The Team:

Our iOS Team works in a small international team, closely together with the Android and the backend teams. Our outstanding team spirit is driven by flat hierarchies, a high degree of self-organization and a high degree of technology freedom. If you have a strong motivation to create a state-of-the-art app and to deliver high-quality code, by using code reviews, test automation and clean app architecture, let’s talk.

As an iOS Developer in our Mobile development team, you make significant contributions to the development of the Bonial Products in Germany and France for iOS smartphones and tablets.

Furthermore, you will...
• Assist with the conception and evaluation of new features and software architectures.
• Realize device, performance, and stability tests, utilizing code review and continuous integration.
• Improve your experience in developing mobile applications and define easy to understand cross-platform solutions.
• Develop high-traffic international products with a focus on quality and stability
• Work with innovative technologies and methods
As a Senior iOS Developer in our company, you will have the opportunity to:
• Give a significant contribution to our Apps (KaufDA, MeinProspekt and Bonial) and Business
• Gain experience in software design and architecture like VIPER
• Explore technologies like AWS, Appium & Buddybuild
• Be a team player in our cross-functional set-up
• Build an app in the spirit of a Lean/Agile (Scrum, Kanban, Scrum-ban)
• Room to grow: you'll have the opportunity to bring your ideas to the table and take on real responsibilities

Qualifications

If you have …
• At least 3 years of practical iOS Development experience
• Good knowledge of web technologies and web services (e.g. HTTPS, JSON, REST)
• Knowledge of iOS SDK and frameworks
• Experiences in OOP in Swift & Objective-C
• Interest in current trends in the area of mobile software development and mobile apps
• Familiarity with automation testing concepts and continuous integration
• A team player attitude and always lending a hand and take on a new challenges
• Creativity, ambition, drive and reliability
• Fluent communication skills in English, German is NOT required!

Then come and apply!

Additional Information

Once you are part of Bonial, we offer you great opportunities to grow. We have a clear career path, depending on your personal goals. In order to reach these goals, you have feedback talks with your team lead on a regular basis. Additionally, you can enjoy the view of on our roof terrace during our monthly meetups and regular team- and company events.

More (fun)facts:
• Bonial is celebrating its 10th birthday this year!
• Did you know that employee number one is still working at our company?
• And our own CMO started as a trainee back in 2012.
• We have a shiny new office with a good view of the sights of Berlin.
• We have some seriously impressive Karaoke singers in the company!
• For parents – we have a nice Family-room in case your Kita is bailing on you..

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer - Health Care App (m/w/d) Trier
jobs_results.description:
iOS Developer - Health Care App (m/w/d) Trier

Veröffentlicht:

15.10.2024

Eintrittsdatum:

01.12.2024

Art:

Temporäre Stelle 6 Monate (Option auf Verlängerung)

Einsatzort:

Trier

Vertragsart:

Freelance

Warum

HIBA GmbH

?

HIBA zeichnet sich durch ein innovatives und dynamisches Arbeitsumfeld aus, das sich auf IT- und Engineering-Lösungen spezialisiert hat. Wir bieten fortlaufende Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten, um sicherzustellen, dass unsere Mitarbeiter stets auf dem neuesten Stand der Technologie sind. Mit flexiblen Arbeitszeiten und der Möglichkeit zum Home-Office unterstützen wir eine ausgewogene Work-Life-Balance. Unsere attraktive Vergütung und umfangreichen Karrierechancen machen HIBA zu einem idealen Ort für motivierte Fachkräfte, die ihre Karriere in der IT- und Engineering-Branche vorantreiben möchten.

Stellenbeschreibung

für iOS Developer - Health Care App (m/w/d)

aktuell suchen wir für unseren Kunden einen iOS Developer - Health Care App (m/w/d)

Deine

Aufgaben

.
• Entwicklung und Wartung von iOS-Anwendungen im Bereich Healthcare.
• Konzeption, Design und Implementierung von neuen Features sowie deren Weiterentwicklung.
• Enge Zusammenarbeit mit Backend-Entwicklern, UX/UI-Designern und dem Product-Management.
• Sicherstellung von hoher Code-Qualität durch Code Reviews und Unit Tests.
• Integration von Schnittstellen (APIs) und anderen Technologien, die in Gesundheits-Apps erforderlich sind.
• Analyse und Lösung von technischen Problemen sowie Optimierung der App-Performance.

Dein
Profil

.
• Abgeschlossenes Studium im Bereich Informatik oder vergleichbare Ausbildung.
• Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung in der iOS-Entwicklung mit Swift und Objective-C.
• Erfahrung mit HealthKit, CoreData, und der Integration von APIs.
• Verständnis von den Anforderungen im Gesundheitswesen, idealerweise Erfahrung mit Health Apps.
• Erfahrung in der Arbeit mit agilen Entwicklungsmethoden (Scrum/Kanban).
• Kenntnisse in Git sowie modernen Entwicklungstools wie Xcode.
• Gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse.

Alternativ kannst du dich auch sehr gerne per E-Mail bei uns bewerben.

E-Mail:

job@hiba.de

Telefon:

+49 6108 9984959
